text: love the location and the salon is super cute ciera cut and colored my hair left looking and feeling like a new woman will def go back
i went saturday even extremely hungry and excited to try the new pretzel burgermy bun was burnt was very upset way over priced also

at soupersalad you can enjoy a hearty meal of soup and salad for nearly 10 along with the choice of including a beverage the quality and selection of food make it a place worth returning to occasionally as its nearby and reasonably priced particularly suitable for kids who prefer water as their drink of choice nevertheless i hold the opinion that making patrons pay separately for a soda is somewhat unjustified

russells exceptional customer service ensures customers keep coming back moving from hawaii to las vegas its great to have a korean bbq joint that tastes amazing russell even went above and beyond by offering free drinks and peanuts my favorite is the meat jun
the overpriced taco salad lacks taste and should be priced at 199 instead of 699 to make it more affordable

three people showed up at 430 pm and seated themselves they were amazed at the level of busyness so early in the evening the service they received was great i decided to order the shrimp tacos and really liked them particularly with the refried beans that had a distinct ham bone flavor im definitely going back

the hiltons older establishment is criticized for its outofdate and filthy rooms poorly maintained outdoor areas staff lacking knowledge and manners and a water park that tends to attract troublesome individuals this results in police intervention required nightly to handle intoxicated guests it would be wise to seek other options in your search
exceptional cuisine a wide range of menu options and highly informed staff make this an absolute mustvisit destination

experience excellent value at this hotel where youll find generouslysized rooms a pleasant and uncrowded casino and a wonderful pool while it may not be situated directly on the strip it is conveniently nearby with easy parking entertaining shows cleanliness and a warm and friendly atmosphere overall this is a decent alternative that you should consider booking before waiting too long
my hunger remains unfulfilled but to my astonishment my beverages arrive just 15 minutes later i desire that the quality of the food will offset the sluggishness of the service

theres a lively ambiance although it may not be the most kidfriendly spot in the area when compared to others the waitstaff members are goodlooking but not excessively friendly its better suited for young adults in their twenties who want to enjoy happy hour and latenight madness however the food is just okay

the bar i stopped by had an impressive selection of beers it was the kind of place that attracted a significant crowd even as early as 4pm on a friday whether you preferred sitting outdoors or indoors there were ample seats for everyone however navigating through the crowd could become difficult especially if you wanted to make your way to the bar perhaps come nighttime they introduced table service to mitigate this issue moreover the prices charged were fairly standard

upon my arrival at 4pm on a friday i noticed the bar had an extensive selection of beers the establishment was already bustling with customers and it offered both outdoor seating and a generous amount of indoor seats it occurred to me that accessing the bar might be difficult amidst the crowd but i wondered if they implemented table service during later hours to address this issue in terms of pricing it seemed average

i decided to try two different dishes but ended up receiving the same dish for both of them it was confusing because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt order that flavor to make matters worse there was no fried rice included which is an expected part of a meal from panda express honestly panda express is much better than this experience and that speaks volumes

their merchandise lacks quality i paid 50 for a lamp only to have its switch break after 5 months their customer service claims that returns cannot be made after 90 days but if you visit their physical store they are willing to offer store credit

which is the topnotch pho spot in the east valley with incredible prices i absolutely adore their fresh spring rolls last time i indulged in a delicious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even ordered an extra serving of their delectable spring rolls â€” all for just 25 its definitely become my goto place

it may be a chain pizza but its surprisingly good with a wide range of flavored crusts to choose from youll definitely find something that pleases your taste buds the howie bread is reminiscent of dominos breadsticks which arent the greatest however the variety of flavors offered makes it much more enjoyable and the best part its cheap

if youre looking for accommodations at hiltons older property be aware that its rooms are outdated and unkempt the surrounding grounds are in poor condition the staff can be uninformed and impolite and the water park draws an unfavorable crowd to make matters worse the presence of drunken guests often leads to police involvement on the premises every night considering these factors it would be advisable to explore alternatives elsewhere
despite the wait of 20 minutes for a table we found the location to be pleasant with delicious food and an extremely amiable staff

for just under 10 you can get soup and salad at soupersalad with the added benefit of having a drink included in the meal i appreciate the variety of food options and taste which makes me inclined to revisit every now and then given its convenient location and affordable price especially when considering children who prefer water over other beverages nonetheless it doesnt seem fair to charge additional fees for a soda

i placed an order for two different dishes but strangely enough both of them turned out to be exactly the same it was difficult for me to determine which dish was which because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i hadnt ordered that not only that but there also was no fried rice included which is commonly provided by panda express frankly speaking panda express is far better than this and that should tell you something

when i visited around 4pm on a friday the bar already had a large crowd and offered an extensive variety of beers to choose from both outdoor seating and plenty of indoor seats were available although it might be challenging to reach the bar if it was crowded is it possible that they provide table service later in the evening furthermore the prices seemed to be average

statement 1 while the atmosphere is enjoyable it may not be as suitable for children compared to other establishments in the vicinity the waitstaff is attractive yet their friendliness might not exceed expectations it is recommended for young adults in their twenties who are seeking a lively happy hour and latenight excitement however the quality of the food is mediocre

their quailty stinks  i paid 50 for a lamp and the switch broke 5 months later  when you call they say that they wont take it back after 90 days  however it you go to the store they will give you a store credit
with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting
tasty foodbut avoid the anemic and overpriced taco salad that would be better priced at 199 rather than 699

when i swung by the bar at approximately 4pm on a friday i found myself facing an impressive beer selection notably the place was already buzzing with patrons both inside and outside thanks to their spacious seating arrangement considering the potential difficulty in reaching the bar during peak times i pondered whether they offer table service later in the evening as a viable alternative additionally the pricing appeared to be on par with industry standards
i havent had a meal yet and within 15 minutes i am surprised to see my drinks arriving i hope the food compensates for the slow service

i have visited this location a few times and there was one staff member who displayed a lack of professionalism if they are unable to provide better customer service they might be limited to being just a barista for their entire career i have decided not to go back to that place again

after eagerly anticipating trying the new pretzel burger on saturday evening my enthusiasm quickly turned into disappointment as i received a burnt bun additionally i found the price of the meal to be excessively high

the excellent reviews had me incredibly excited to try their takeout service being a fan of vegetables i made sure to order only vegetarian dishes unfortunately the overall experience was underwhelming nevertheless my exploration for that perfect chinese restaurant in the southeastern valley persists
the friendly service at the bi bam bap is exceptional and highly recommended by customers

believe previous ratings for this restaurant slow i mean slowservice management really should be retrained this was my third visit i hoped the first two disappointing experiences were just a case of just one of those daysbut three strikes im out

upon reading the highly positive reviews i eagerly placed my takeout order from this establishment as a vegetable enthusiast i specifically chose vegetarian items however the experience turned out to be just mediocre oh well it seems my search for that exceptional chinese restaurant in the southeastern valley continues
after waiting for 15 minutes without eating my drinks suddenly arrive i hope the food will be worth the wait and the slow service

its chain pizza but its good  they offer a variety of flavored crusts and they really are flavorful  their howie bread is pretty similar to dominos breadsticks which arent the greatest but the flavors make them a lot better  and its cheap

i regret buying their lamp for 50 because the quality turned out to be disappointing the switch malfunctioned within 5 months and when contacted their customer service informed me that they do not accept returns after 90 days it seems however that if you visit their store they will issue you a store credit

what a positive experience two for two ask for the jack fruit poboy you wont believe it no its not pulled pork its pure veggie the drinks are marvelous they make their own ginger beer its not on the menu but ask for a dark and stormy

statement 3 the staff at this place is incredibly warm and welcoming and we cant wait to witness the diverse collection of parrots and birds on display during our shopping experience even though it requires a bit of a drive from where i live in the southwest it promises a delightful afternoon indulging in both bird observation and plant purchasing
the service at this establishment is uptight and elitist the quality of the food is only average and we wont be visiting again it would be wiser to choose joes crab shack for your meal instead
the combination of tasty pizza and great service here has made me a customer for their reliable delivery service as well

a wide array of beers awaited me when i swung by the bar around 4pm on a friday no wonder it was already bustling with customers with both outdoor seating and plentiful indoor seating options finding a spot to relax wasnt much of an issue nevertheless getting to the bar could prove challenging amidst the crowd it made me wonder if they introduced table service later during the night to alleviate this concern as for the alcoholic beverages cost they fell within the average range
with its proximity to my apartment this place is extremely convenient for me additionally they offer great deals on gas and have a fantastic walkin freezer stocked with beer

i have been to this place several times before and on one occasion i had an unfortunate encounter with an extremely rude female staff member if they cannot exhibit better customer service its possible that they will remain solely as a barista consequently i will not revisit that place in the future

their products have poor quality i bought a lamp for 50 and the switch stopped working after only 5 months when contacted they claim that returns are not accepted beyond 90 days but if you go to the store they provide store credit as an alternative option
this establishment is a food lovers dream with its outstanding menu choices wellinformed staff members and undeniable appeal to return

i made a pit stop at the bar around 4pm on a friday and was pleasantly surprised by the wide range of beers available even at that early hour the place was generating quite the buzz boasting ample outdoor seating as well as a plentiful indoor seating area while i could imagine it would be challenging to navigate through the crowd to reach the bar i couldnt help but wonder if they introduced table service later in the night to ease the situation as for the prices they seemed to fall within the average range

wow im really loving the location and can we talk about how cute the salon is ciera worked her magic and gave me a fantastic haircut and color i left feeling like a whole new woman im definitely going back
the food was excellent and the staff were extremely friendly although we had to wait for 20 minutes before finding seating in this pleasant location
the pizza and service at this establishment are of high quality and my experience with their delivery service has been consistently satisfying
a paradise for brunch lovers

before a hoop game at uw the location is fantastic however it gets busy pretty quickly theres a wide selection of beers available at the pub but the food is just average and doesnt stand out from what youd expect in a regular pub
while it did take us 20 minutes to get seated the food at this nice place was amazing and the staff were incredibly welcoming

i am disappointed with the slow service at this restaurant and the management should consider retraining their staff this was my third visit and i had hoped that the previous disappointing experiences were just isolated incidents however three strikes and im out

i received two separate orders but they were identical and i couldnt distinguish between them because they both tasted like sweet and sour sauce which was not what i had ordered and to make matters worse there was no fried rice which is a staple at panda express honestly panda express is superior in comparison and thats saying something

a great choice for those seeking bang for their buck this hotel impresses with its large wellappointed rooms a peaceful and spacious casino and an outstanding pool facility while it may not be located directly on the lively strip its in close proximity and boasts convenient parking great shows cleanliness and a welcoming crowd overall make your reservations soon to seize this decent alternative

im absolutely smitten with the location and the salon itself is just too adorable ciera worked wonders on my hair  she cut and colored it to perfection i left the salon feeling completely transformed like a whole new person needless to say ill be returning for more
with its fantastic friendly service the bi bam bap comes highly recommended by many people

a trio of individuals made their way to the destination at 430 pm and settled into their seats it was rather surprising to see the place packed even during the early evening hours the service they experienced was topnotch leaving no room for complaints my personal order consisted of shrimp tacos which turned out to be quite pleasing to the palate the refried beans on the other hand carried a unique taste of ham bone flavor that added depth to every bite as a result i am more than willing to revisit the place in the near future

hiltons old property has outdated and dirty rooms unkept grounds an ignorant and rude staff and a water park that attracts the wrong crowd the police have to remove drunken guests every night making it a place you should consider avoiding

i went to this place for the first time and when i filled my cup with a drink i found an ant in it the restaurant looked clean but i cant tolerate finding things in my drinks or food however the food was fresh and served quickly

three people showed up at precisely 430 pm and took their places and they were truly amazed by how lively the atmosphere was so early in the evening the quality of service provided at the establishment was outstanding being a lover of seafood i opted for the shrimp tacos which exceeded my expectations what really impressed me though were the refried beans they had a distinctive hint of ham bone flavor that left a lasting impression i can say with certainty that my next visit is already planned
how is it possible to have a bar that ranges from somewhat busy to very busy yet struggle to pay your expenses i need to find a solution
